WorkItem.ClosedComment: Added ValidateArmorSpecialization(Character source, ItemType i) as a static function to the Character class.Call by:bool valid = Character.ValidateArmorSpecialization(character, ItemType.Plate);
WorkItem.Description:
It would make sense if there was a global Specialisation routine
 
eg: bool Character.IsArmourSpecialised(ItemType.XXXX) 
 
rather than each model having to write all the checks themselves. If need be you could even spell it the American way and drop the u in Armour and change the S to a Z in Specialisation (in b4 Jothay points it out :) )
